commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No cryptid today, either...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I thought for sure we'd find somethin' today since Hanayo saw it yesterday.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Well, it wouldn't be called a cryptid if it was easy to find. Where could that thing be hiding?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey guys! Come here for a sec!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What's up?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: This is just a thought, but maybe it's just that we're not looking for it properly. We're trying to find an ocean cryptid, but we've been searching on land this whole time.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Huh, come to think of it... Yeah, we've really only covered the beach and the roads and wherever we can see from land.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: So I'm thinking we should expand our search area into the ocean!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hey, girls.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: K-Kanan!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh? Where's You?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: She couldn't come with me because something came up at the last minute, but she said she'd meet back up with us after she finishes. We'll just have to wait a bit for her.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Got it! Anyway, nobody knows the sea more than Kanan, so that's why I got her to come out here!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: That makes so much sense! Kanan's a diver and You's on the swim team, so she's great at swimming. They're the perfect people to help us!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I was really shocked when Honoka told me what was up. Like, seriously, a cryptid? But hey, it could be fun. I'd love to meet a sea cryptid!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Okay, but there's all kinds of stuff we need to prepare if we're actually searching the ocean, right? You know, like wetsuits, oxygen tanks... That kinda stuff!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: No worries on that front. I've already scoped out a shop near here where we can rent some diving equipment.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You're always thinking one step ahead, Kanan! Let's get shopping, then!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: There! All suited up!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Kanan, um...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hm?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Please be careful. If you really do find something out there, don't get too close to it, and you should probably just leave it alone.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I appreciate the concern, but I'll be fine! I'm not a full-fledged diver, but I know what I'm doing. The sea is fun, but also dangerous. That said, I'm off!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Whoa! So this is what the ocean's like in Tokyo. It really does feel a little different from the waters in Uchiura. Oh, there's even fish around here. They're so cute!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It's different, but not completely foreign. Even with all these new sensations, there's a feeling of familiarity too... It must be because it connects to Uchiura, too.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I think I'll dive a little deeper. I wanna see more of Tokyo's underwater world!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: *Gasp*

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, Kanan! You're back!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You made it back to the surface! Great job.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yup! Good to be back!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: H-How was it?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Awesome! The ocean here in Tokyo is pretty great, too. Man, diving really is the best!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Aw, I'm so glad you had fun. So hey, did you find the cryptid?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The cryptid? ...Oops.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: S-Sorry. I forgot.
